A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat-loving elderly neighbor, an evil crows nest on the property that serves as a gateway to dark forces from the old world, an oppressive father and freedom sacrificed to one's job. The story is told through modern society's point of view while featuring ancient folklore.
